EmailTemplate.subject: NCS The Challenge Paid Job Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge is the largest provider of National Citizen Service (NCS) and we are looking to recruit a two new team to help engage young people for our NCS programmes.
WHY WORK WITH THE CHALLENGE? • Paid roles for £18,000 per annum pro rata • We have fixed-term, full-time and parttime roles available for 3-3.5 months as well permanent full time year round roles • A variety of working patterns, including evening and weekend work to fit around other commitments • Valuable third sector experience • Full training and support specific to these roles will be provided
The role: Calling Team Agent
We are looking for passionate and enthusiastic full-time and part-time team members to fill a large number of vacancies in our Calling Teams in Manchester. You will be calling young people and their parents and guardians who have expressed interest in our NCS programmes to persuade them to sign up, take application information and payments. Our offices are just a short walk from the Old Trafford tram stop and have excellent transport links.
Apply NOW by sending your CV to: ts.jobs@thechallenge.org or call 0203 542 2399 if you have any questions about the role.
For more information please click on this link and look at the role: http://www.thechallenge.org/index.php/about-thechallenge-programmes/work-withus/work-for-us
Good Luck!
